lyrics:
14 contributorsstill in love with you lyricsverse 1 nick jonas
she was all i ever wanted
she was all i ever needed and more
but she walked out my door

prechorus nick jonas
yeah she went away
left my heart in two
left me standing here
singing all these blues woo

chorus joe jonas  nick jonas
you left without a single word not even sorry
it mightve hurt worse to hear you say im leaving goodbye
but your smile still makes my heart sing another sad song
i cant forget it i wont regret it
cause im still in love with you

verse 2 nick jonas
we had fun under the sun
and when winter came shed be my angel
we were so in love

prechorus nick jonas
then she went away
left my heart in two
left me standing here
singing all these blues yeah yeah
see jonas brothers liveget tickets as low as 30you might also likechorus joe jonas  nick jonas
you left without a single word not even sorry
it mightve hurt worse to hear you say im leaving goodbye
but your smile still makes my heart sing another sad song
i cant forget it i wont regret it
cause im still in love with you
still in love with you

bridge nick jonas
i dont know what hurts worse baby
seeing you with him or being alone on my own
i know he doesnt love you baby
not like i did
oh whats the point
youre not listening anyway

chorus joe jonas  nick jonas
you left without a single word not even sorry
it mightve hurt worse to hear you say im leaving goodbye
but your smile still makes my heart sing another sad song
i cant forget it i wont regret it
cause im still in love with you
you left without a single word not even sorry
it mightve hurt worse to hear you say im leaving goodbye
but your smile still makes my heart sing another sad song
i cant forget it i wont regret it
cause im still in love with you1embed
